articles.title: RedNote: Chinese users react to US 'TikTok refugees' - BBC.com
articles.description: RedNote's Chinese users say it is the first time they have been able to speak directly to Americans online.
articles.content:
Thousands of TikTok users have migrated to popular Chinese social media app RedNote
A looming TikTok ban has connected Chinese and American citizens like never before, as they swap jokes and memes i… [+6912 chars]
